name: Visual Novel Maker - Visual Novel Music Vol.1
detailed_description:
Visual Novel Music Vol 1 is jam packed with triumphant, melodic, professionally produced music to enhance your Visual Novel stories! Featuring music covering a vast array of scenarios and moods, and produced with a wide palette of instrumentation to fit the mood perfectly of each track, your Visual Novels will come to life with this exciting new pack!

Features:

* 25 Royalty-free songs
* For use in RPG Maker, Visual Novel software or the engine of your choice
* Music for Fanfares, morning, evening, afternoon, anger, happiness, tension, endings and more!
* OGG and M4A formats included

Tracklist:

VNM_BMG01 Theme
VNM_BMG02 Fanfare
